com.envibe.envibe.dao

Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.envibe.envibe.dao.UserDao

  • @Repository
public class UserDao
extends Object
    Data access object for Users that are stored in a permanent JDBC-compatible datastore. Utilizes CRUD model.
    Author:
    ARMmaster17

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate
      Injected JDBC connection object to run queries against.
      (package private) String queryCreate
      Prepared query to insert user records into database.
      (package private) String queryDelete
      Prepared query to delete user records in database.
      (package private) String queryRead
      Prepared query to search for user records in database.
      (package private) String queryUpdate
      Prepared query to update user records in database.

      • create

        public void create(@Valid
                   @Valid User user)
        Creates a pre-validated user in the permanent datastore.
        Parameters:

      • read

        public User read(@NotNull
                 @NotNull String username)
        Searches for a user record with given username.
        Parameters:
        username - Username to search for.
        Returns:
        User model object if the specified username exists. Otherwise returns null.

      • update

        public void update(@Valid
                   @Valid User user)
        Updates the core account information for the specified user. Note that the username must be the same as the original record.
        Parameters:
        user - Pre-validated user model object to replace existing record in permanent datastore.

      • delete

        public void delete(@Valid
                   @Valid User user)
        Permanently deletes the specified user record from the permanent datastore.
        Parameters:
        user - User model object that represents the record to be deleted.
